00029 #ifndef _AP4_TKHD_ATOM_H_
00030 #define _AP4_TKHD_ATOM_H_

00033 |   includes
00034 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/

00038 |   constants
00039 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/

00041 const int AP4_TKHD_FLAG_TRACK_IN_MOVIE   = 2;
00042 const int AP4_TKHD_FLAG_TRACK_IN_PREVIEW = 4;
00043 
00044 const int AP4_TKHD_FLAG_DEFAULTS         = 7;
00045 
00046 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 |   AP4_TkhdAtom
00048 +---------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 class AP4_TkhdAtom : public AP4_Atom
00050 {
00051 public:
00052     // class methods
00053     static AP4_TkhdAtom* Create(AP4_Size size, AP4_ByteStream& stream);
00054 
00055     // methods
00056     AP4_TkhdAtom(AP4_UI32 creation_time,
00057                  AP4_UI32 modification_time,
00058                  AP4_UI32 track_id,
00059                  AP4_UI32 duration,
00060                  AP4_UI16 volume,
00061                  AP4_UI32 width,
00062                  AP4_UI32 height);    
00063     virtual AP4_Result InspectFields(AP4_AtomInspector& inspector);
00064     virtual AP4_Result WriteFields(AP4_ByteStream& stream);
00065 
00066     AP4_UI32   GetDuration() { return m_Duration; }
00067     AP4_Result SetDuration(AP4_UI32 duration) {
00068         m_Duration = duration;
00069         return AP4_SUCCESS;
00070     }
00071     AP4_UI32   GetTrackId()  { return m_TrackId;  }
00072     AP4_Result SetTrackId(AP4_UI32 track_id)  { 
00073         m_TrackId = track_id;
00074         return AP4_SUCCESS;  
00075     }
00076 
00077     void GetTranslation(float& x, float& y) {
00078         x = (float)(*(int*)&m_Matrix[6]) / 65536;
00079         y = (float)(*(int*)&m_Matrix[7]) / 65536;
00080     }
00081 
00082     AP4_UI32 GetWidth()  { return m_Width; }
00083     AP4_UI32 GetHeight() { return m_Height;}
00084 
00085  private:
00086     // methods
00087     AP4_TkhdAtom(AP4_UI32        size, 
00088                  AP4_UI32        version,
00089                  AP4_UI32        flags,
00090                  AP4_ByteStream& stream);
00091 
00092     // members
00093     AP4_UI32 m_CreationTimeH;
00094     AP4_UI32 m_CreationTime;
00095     AP4_UI32 m_ModificationTimeH;
00096     AP4_UI32 m_ModificationTime;
00097     AP4_UI32 m_TrackId;
00098     AP4_UI32 m_Reserved1;
00099     AP4_UI32 m_DurationH;
00100     AP4_UI32 m_Duration;
00101     AP4_UI32 m_Reserved2[2];
00102     AP4_UI16 m_Layer;
00103     AP4_UI16 m_AlternateGroup;
00104     AP4_UI16 m_Volume;
00105     AP4_UI16 m_Reserved3;
00106     AP4_UI32 m_Matrix[9];
00107     AP4_UI32 m_Width;
00108     AP4_UI32 m_Height;
